text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump Why are you making this about a culture war? The facts are that indoor spaces with crowds of people in close proximity is dangerous. Then add all the singing. COVID19 loves that. You all can't even be responsible enough to agree to mandatory masks and you want this??
